creatives.headline: EcoSip: Stay Cool, Save the Planet
creatives.body: Join the eco‑movement with a reusable bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours. BPA‑free, double‑wall insulated, and backed by a lifetime warranty—all for $24.99.
creatives.justification: Uses sustainability‑focused language proven to lift CTR on social; aligns with eco‑conscious shoppers and friendly, inspiring tone.

creatives.headline: Your Workout Buddy, Eco Style
creatives.body: Fuel your fitness with a leak‑proof, dishwasher‑safe bottle that stays icy cold. Perfect for gym sessions or trail runs, and it's BPA‑free for peace of mind.
creatives.justification: Targets fitness enthusiasts, highlights double‑wall insulation and durability; matches historical social performance on active‑lifestyle messaging.

creatives.headline: Double‑Wall Insulation Keeps Drinks Cold 24h
creatives.body: EcoSip's insulated bottle delivers icy refreshment all day, leak‑proof lid, dishwasher safe, and a lifetime warranty—all for $24.99.
creatives.justification: Feature‑focused headline leverages display‑channel keyword strengths (insulation, BPA‑free) and drives brand awareness.

creatives.headline: Lifetime Warranty on Every EcoSip Bottle
creatives.body: Invest in a bottle that lasts a lifetime. BPA‑free, double‑wall insulated, and built to reduce single‑use plastic—yours for $24.99.
creatives.justification: Emphasizes durability and warranty, resonating with mature, sustainability‑focused audience; aligns with display's effective keyword set.
